feed.title: Tough questions for Peter Todd, Chief Scientist {Mastercoin | Counterparty | Coinkite | Darkwallet | Viacoin}

entry.title: Tough questions for Peter Todd, Chief Scientist {Mastercoin | Counterparty | Coinkite | Darkwallet | Viacoin}
entry.summary: The context given is a list of information that Berg Investigations LLC needs from an individual. The list includes hours per week spent on each project out of a 40-hour work week, upfront and ongoing fees for using the person's name, total amounts broken down for each project, start and end dates for contracts, current and past holdings of altcoins/appcoins along with liquidation dates, return on investment to investors that are related to their activities during employment excluding marketing/price pump, involvement in Initial Coin Offers (ICO), and explanation for pursuing ICO fund sources rather than community or established businesses.
